title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a running race in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about running in a dream, running or jogging indicates striving for a living, as seeing races indicates overcoming obstacles and achieving a distinguished position in society, and interpreting a dream about victory in a race, and a neighbor running after a dead person, running with someone, running with someone I know him A dream about slow running Dreaming about seeing a dream about running is a testimony to the many events that will happen to the dreamer. It is possible to know the types of sports that many people like, such as running to replenish the body's muscles and lose weight. Intended for married and married men. Seeing a married woman dreaming that she is running and pregnant, and seeing races and running, means achieving goals and achieving what is desired. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a running race: Seeing a running race in a dream means victory in life and achieving what one desires. Watching a running race shows the observer’s desire to compete at work And overcoming obstacles. Interpretation of a dream about winning a game is a testimony to the dreamer’s success in all aspects of life. Seeing a running game in a dream means achieving goals and success. Interpretation of dreams about chasing a car in a dream shows the competitive spirit of the dreamer. Read also: Interpretation of a dream you see walking in the street. Interpretation of a vision Running race for men: Seeing a young man running in a fight with someone indicates intense competition between them, and the person who wins the dream is the one who outperforms the other and achieves what he wants. A young man dreams of participating in a competition as a great opportunity for success in his life and it could be a new job or marriage to a beautiful girl. Seeing a married man running and sweating means that he is seeking to earn halal money. The dream of a man who dreams of a woman running after him while jogging is a sign of his good luck in life and the fulfillment of his desires. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing the road in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a running race for a married woman: The married woman who dreams That she can run and run fast indicates fear and panic for her children. Seeing married people participating in election campaigns is a vision of achieving goals, getting a lot of money and living well. Interpretation of a dream about a running race for a pregnant woman: Explain the dream of running on the hands and feet of a pregnant woman, because This vision indicates an upcoming birthday. It is good for a pregnant woman to see that she is running fast while jogging. A pregnant woman’s dream is to participate in a fight with a man. Read also: Interpretation of a dream of seeing walking in a dream Interpretation of a dream of an individual running race: Seeing a girl chasing a man while Running means that the girl is pursuing one of her desires. Explain the dream of running in a dream with someone, indicating victory and triumph over enemies. Seeing unmarried girls running after sheep indicates their livelihood and their pursuit of good things. Interpretation of a dream about a running race by Ibn Shaheen: Seeing the dreamer winning By racing, this dream indicates that he has succeeded in some aspect of his life. The dream of running symbolizes the pursuit of livelihood and halal food. The dream of losing the game is evidence of many wrong decisions. If one sees in his dream that he is participating in a running race but is not actually participating in it, This vision warns him and threatens him

title: Interpretation of a dream about having a hole in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a hole in a dream for a single, married man and a pregnant woman, according to the interpretations of some interpretation scholars, explain the interpretation of the vision, but this interpretation is specific to the person who saw the vision, so it is difficult to apply this vision to another person except by knowing his personal circumstances, and you can also be interested in knowing the lentils in the dream, and for this reason no These interpretations should be taken seriously, and the dreamer should be asked to review the vision he saw in order to explain all the circumstances to him so that he obtains the correct interpretation of this vision. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a hole in a dream: It indicates deception and cunning in most cases, except that the appearance of water in the hole in The dream indicates the fruit of hard work. The interpretation of a dream about seeing a hole in a dream for a girl can indicate a problem that is not small that she will face and it could be as large as the depth of this hole. The interpretation of seeing yourself falling into a hole in a dream may be evidence that he will suddenly lose or enter into a failed project or He is going through a bad relationship. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a hole in a dream by Ibn Sirin. He says in the interpretation of dreams by Ibn Sirin that seeing a hole in a dream has two meanings, one good and the other bad. He says that the interpretation of the dream is seeing a hole in a dream when a man sees himself standing on the edge of the hole without falling, then this It indicates a quarrel or quarrel with his wife, causing a quarrel, but they will reconcile, and God knows best. As for seeing a man emerging from a small hole, it indicates the freedom of a prisoner or captive, or recovery from illness. Just as the dreamer sees himself in a hole without any harm, this indicates a lot of sustenance for the dreamer. Especially if the hole contains food and drink, and God knows best. Seeing a hole in a dream is for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a hole in a dream for a married woman indicates that she will become pregnant soon, if the married woman falls into the hole during the dream, and God knows best. It may also indicate that a married woman who sees herself Inside a hole in a dream indicates that there will be a quarrel between her and her husband, but they will quickly reconcile. Seeing the hole in a single woman’s dreamInterpretation of a dream about seeing a hole in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates that she will get married soon, especially if the unmarried person sees himself falling into the hole, and God knows best. As for an unmarried girl who sees that there is a hole in her house and is trying to fill it, this indicates attempts to get rid of an existing problem in her life. Seeing the hole in a divorced woman’s dream. Interpretation of dreams: Seeing a hole in a dream for a divorced woman who sees herself trying to fill the void indicates that she She is trying to get rid of one of the problems in her life, and God knows best. But if a divorced woman sees someone digging a hole in her house and becomes afraid, this may be a sign that she is in trouble. Likewise, if a divorced woman sees a hole in her driveway while getting rid of it, this indicates that she will get rid of a problem that exists in Her life, and God knows best. Seeing a hole in a dream for a man. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a hole in a dream for a man. When he sees a hole in his path in a dream, this indicates some crises and problems that he will encounter, and God knows best. Also, the man falling into the hole during the dream indicates an increase in

title: Interpretation of a dream about a sister hitting her sister in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of a sister hitting her sister in a dream The science of dream interpretation is one of the sciences in which many Muslim scholars excelled when they, in turn, dealt with the interpretation of the dreams that the sleeper saw in his dreams and their interpretations. entails. It is possible for a person to face reality, and from here many people go to search in the interpretation books of the most famous scholars. Dream interpretation, such as Ibn Ali, Ibn Sirin, and Al-Sadiq, also searches for the interpretation of certain dreams on Internet sites in order to know the interpretation of dreams. Interpretation of a dream about a sister hitting her sister in a dream: If a girl sees that she is hitting her sister in a dream, this is a sign that she is receiving advice from her sister who is hitting her in her troubles. As well as an indication of its usefulness and usefulness. Given. From her sister. Interpretation of a dream about a sister hitting a brother: Girls’ dreams are many, including a sister hitting her brother, where hitting in a dream is one of the annoying things that the girl and others have. The brother has a problem that will happen between them soon, and this is due to her extreme psychological fatigue from her brother. Interpretation of a dream about a brother hitting his sister in a dream. Ibn Sirin continued by interpreting the vision of being beaten in a dream in general, that this is an indication that the person affected by the tax is characterized by neglect and disappointment, and in the case of the person’s opinion Who hits another person for free. the reason. Or need, then this is a sign that he will obtain abundant money and a large living, but in the event that the brother hits his sister in the dream as follows: In the case of a dream that he hits his sister in a dream, this is a sign of hostility and disagreements between them. In the event that an unmarried girl sees that she is hitting her sister In a dream, this is a sign of jealousy between them. Here, in the case of a married girl who sees her hitting her sister in a dream, this is a sign of the girl who saw the vision’s jealousy of her sister. Read also: At the end of our conversation and article about the interpretation of a dream about a sister hitting her sister in a dream, there are many interpretations. The different types of dreams, and this is what leads a person into many mazes.

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about Ibn Sirin’s pen?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a pen: The pen has many uses in our daily lives and we cannot abandon it, as mentioned in the Qur’an, but seeing it in a dream is likely to bring us many important interpretations and connotations in our lives, or perhaps it wants that. To convey to us a meaning or a warning message, so we repent of it. Interpretation of a dream of a golden pen, interpretation of a dream of a green pen, interpretation of a dream of a white pen, interpretation of a dream of a wild pen. Interpretation of a dream of a pen. The meaning of a pen in a dream symbolizes sophistication, status, and the pursuit of high goals. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is writing with a pen, then the vision symbolizes marriage in The near future or obtaining an excellent position in his work. If the dreamer works in the field of trade and sees in his dream an attractive and distinctive pen, the vision symbolizes gaining a lot of money through success in his work. Whoever saw the pen in his dream and was a seeker of knowledge and study, the vision It states that he will pass higher grades and succeed in exams. Seeing a broken pen in a dream while writing means that the dreamer will suffer many losses and also indicates an imminent death. In case the dreamer sees that the pen flies over him and falls to the ground and breaks, then the vision indicates a trip to a place Far away. If the dreamer is suffering from an illness and sees a pen in his dream, the vision will lead to recovery and similar recovery, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about a pen by Ibn Sirin. According to what was stated in Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about a pen: A married woman who sees a pen in her dream indicates her feeling of calm. And peace in her marital life. If there are many marital problems in the dreamer’s life and he sees the pen broken in his dream, the vision symbolizes the many disagreements and problems between them and is likely to lead to divorce. If the dreamer is a seeker of knowledge and studies and sees the pen in his dream, the vision will lead to success. In academic life and he will be able to pass higher grades with distinction. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is sitting next to a small child and teaching him with a pen, then the vision indicates that he is a person who loves others and loves to help them and give them his knowledge so that others can benefit. . From this.Interpretation of a dream of a single woman, we find many important interpretations and clues that explain the interpretation of a pen in an unmarried girl’s dream, such as: If an unmarried girl sees a pen in her dream, the vision symbolizes love and an intimate relationship with the person she loves.The unmarried woman who sees the pen In her dream, when she is in the appropriate period for marriage, the vision indicates that God blesses her with a righteous man who knows God and treats her in the best way and who also has the qualities of generosity, giving and love. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is writing with a pen, the vision symbolizes that she is seeking knowledge and a lot of knowledge. And knowledge that will benefit others. Whoever dreams that she holds a pen and stands in front of people and teaches them, symbolizes that she will reach a great position after a period of fatigue and effort. If an unmarried woman sees that she has many pens, the vision leads to good morals and a good reputation among people. If the dreamer sees Take

title: Learn about the interpretation of seeing watermelon in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing watermelon in a dream Watermelon is one of the fruits that many people love. Either seeing watermelon in a dream is good or there is another meaning that is not clear and the viewer must pay attention to it. In the following lines we will explain the details so that readers’ attention is not distracted between the different interpretations. Read with us. Interpretation of seeing watermelon In a dream, seeing watermelon in a dream for the dreamer shows the good news that he will receive in the coming days, and he has been waiting for her for a long time, and eating watermelon in a dream for a girl shows a close marriage with her to a wealthy man. The man and you will live with him in happiness and love as compensation for past sorrows. Seeing watermelon in a woman’s vision leads to positive transformations that will occur in her life in the coming period, and watermelon in the dreamer’s sleep will have a suitable job opportunity that will improve his financial income for the better. Interpretation of seeing watermelon in a dream for a son Sirin: Ibn Sirin says that seeing watermelon in a girl’s dream symbolizes her acceptance of repentance after she has turned away from sins and actions contrary to Sharia and religion and followed the righteous so that she can return to being a useful man in society. Peace and stability. Seeing a watermelon in a dream for a woman leads to a big promotion at work that improves her social status to the better and better, and watermelon seeds in the dreamer’s sleep symbolize the great wealth that she will enjoy as a result of resuming difficult tasks. And fulfill them without losses. The Asrar website for dream interpretation is a site specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just write. title: Interpretation of a dream about tangerines in a dream about a man and a woman

preview.html: Tangerines contain a distinctive set of benefits because they contain vitamins A and B and are a good treatment for influenza and severe colds, so they appear in the winter and everyone eats them at this time to avoid colds that lead to health complications. Interpretation of a dream about tangerines by Ibn Sirin: seeing someone in a dream who has been peeled Tangerines and ready to eat, this is a sign of obtaining money and ample livelihood. Dreaming of tangerines, lobed and separated from each other, is a sign of salvation from some family problems. Seeing yourself eating a ripe tangerine is a sign of goodness and abundant nutrition. Eating a ripe tangerine can indicate To a rich person who enjoys a lot of money during this time. A group of green colored tangerines in a dream, it is a sign of many good things. All rotten tangerines in a dream are evidence of death or exposure to disease. Seeing peeled tangerines in a dream indicates wealth and goodness. Seeing all the quantities If a person sees in a dream that he is picking rotten tangerines in large quantities, this is a sign of death. It could be A dream about a rotten tangerine indicates illness. If a man sees in a dream that he throws tangerines after picking them, this indicates that he will be exposed to scandal. Whoever sees that he is picking tangerines while they are edible, this is evidence of legitimate money and abundant livelihood. Interpretation of a dream about tangerines for a single woman. When a single girl sees tangerines in In a dream, this is a sign of good luck. Tangerines in an unmarried girl’s dream are evidence of achieving goals and dreams. A ripe tangerine in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates that she will marry a good man in the near future. If she sees that she is peeling a tangerine, this indicates that she will express Her feelings for someone in her life. Seeing tangerines early is a sign of positive changes in the lives of unmarried women. Interpretation of a dream about tangerines for a married woman Tangerines in a dream for a married woman are a sign of wealth and fortune. Tangerines in a dream for a married woman are evidence of happy news. Interpretation of a dream about tangerines For a pregnant woman, eating tangerines in a dream is an indication that she will give birth to a male child. Eating sweet tangerines, this is a sign of the birth of a female. Add the dream that you would like to interpret in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing or hearing Surah Al-Fatihah in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams: Seeing or hearing Surat Al-Fatihah in a dream and seeing Surat Al-Fatihah in a dream indicates the answer to prayers, the satisfaction of desires, and the death of worry and anxiety, because it indicates piety and faith. The fortuneteller and the interpretation of Surat Al-Fatihah in a dream indicates many different meanings. It is one of the surahs of the Qur’an whose sight in a dream indicates many different associations, and dream interpreters point to it. In some interpretations of Surat Al-Fatiha, there is a lot of goodness that it brings to its viewers. Interpretation of a dream about seeing or hearing Surat Al-Fatiha in a dream for a single woman. His solitary scenes convey to someone he may know who was talking next to her and then recited Surat Al-Fatiha with absolute certainty. This is an indication that a good relationship, compassion, and love can It arises between them. If an unmarried woman hears the sheikh reciting Surat Al-Fatiha in a sweet voice, this is a sign of goodness and abundance. Therefore, it is considered a warning for her to know the duties of God. Interpretation of a dream about reading Surat Al-Fatiha in a dream for a girl indicates her imminent marriage and that God Almighty will answer her and her prayers. Change the vision of reading Surat Al-Fatiha Al-Fatihah for a single woman means that she will achieve what she wants, and this is a sign that she hears a lot of good news. The vision of a single woman in a dream ends with her hearing a sheikh reciting Al-Fatihah or reading it at her wedding with a fair and just sheikh. But if an unmarried girl is employed in a job, this expresses her superiority. And its success. Interpretation of a dream about seeing or hearing Surat Al-Fatihah in a dream for a married woman. Reciting Surat Al-Fatihah over a married woman with her children indicates that God will grant her children a prominent position in society. Seeing her eating the Qur’an and reciting Al-Fatihah from it is interpreted in a married woman’s dream. If the dreamer is afraid that something will happen In a dream, this indicates that security will come after fear. Hearing the recitation of Surat Al-Fatiha over a married woman who is experiencing many problems with her husband indicates that these disputes will end soon. The interpretation of a dream about reading Surat Al-Fatiha in a dream for a married woman indicates that she will become pregnant very soon. The wife’s dream is based on By hearing her husband recite Surat Al-Fatihah in a sweet voice. This is evidence of the inclusion of goodness and abundance and expresses the inclusion of mercy and love in her home. The interpretation of Surat Al-Fatihah in a dream for a married woman differs from its interpretation for an unmarried woman. If a married woman sees that she is working on reciting Surat Al-Fatihah, this indicates To open a door for her to earn a livelihood that she had not thought about. Interpretation of a dream about seeing or hearing Surat Al-Fatihah in a dream for a divorced woman. Seeing a divorced woman while working on reciting Surat Al-Fatihah for a specific person, this is a sign of the justice of their affairs and the fulfillment of their desires. Thus, seeing him reciting Al-Fatihah indicates her marriage to a sheikh. Adel Saleh. Instead of God, she will face many different difficulties with her previous marriage. Interpretation of the dream of reading Surat Al-Fatiha in a dream for a divorced woman expresses a lot of happiness that will come to her. Which she will get soon. Interpretation of the dream of seeing or hearing Surat Al-Fatiha in a dream about the fiancée. Watching the fiancé turns out to be Sitting next to her fiancé, the calligraphy

title: Interpretation of a dream about receiving a check in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about receiving a cash check in a dream In case you want to know the interpretation of a dream about receiving a cash check in a dream, it is one of the disturbing dreams that the dreamer wants to know an interpretation for, but you must be careful that these interpretations are the interpretations of interpretation scholars and those responsible for the site have nothing to do with With it. Therefore, one must be careful not to completely believe in these interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about receiving a financial check in a dream: It is possible that the vision of receiving a check in a dream indicates a major improvement that will occur in the dreamer’s life during this period, thanks to God. Anyone who dreams of receiving a bank check may indicate The attention and care that the dreamer receives during this time. Anyone who dreams of receiving a cash check in a dream may indicate paying off debts and getting rid of the financial crises that the dreamer was experiencing at that time. If one sees that he received in a dream a cash check, this may indicate The successes that the dreamer will achieve in his professional life, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about getting a piece of meat in a dream: If you see yourself taking a piece of raw meat in a dream, this may indicate the abundance of sustenance and halal money that the dreamer will acquire during this period. Seeing yourself Eating a piece of meat in a dream may indicate a great benefit that the dreamer may obtain during this time, thanks to God. If one sees that he obtained a piece of meat in a dream, this may indicate getting rid of the corruption that he may face during this time, and God I know. It is possible that the vision of receiving a piece of meat in a dream indicates the abundant benefits that the dreamer will reap during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of the dream of receiving a white dress from the dead in a dream. It is possible that the dream of the dead giving the living a white dress in a dream indicates a long life. The dreamer, and God knows best. Dreaming of a white dress from a dead person may indicate good things that may come to the dreamer at that time. Seeing a white dress taken from the dead in a dream may indicate that the dreamer bears a lot of responsibility for that period. In the event that one sees that He wore a white dress in a dream from among the dead, as this may indicate the dreamer’s expected happiness during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about getting three dates in a dream Seeing three dates in a dream may mean that the dreamer will have good offspring. Seeing yourself eating three dates In a dream, it may indicate good things that the dreamer may gain during this time. In the event that one sees that he has acquired three dates in a dream, this may indicate positive changes that occur in the dreamer’s life during this period. Seeing three dates in a dream can indicate goodness. Which will come to the dreamer during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of receiving three eggs in a dream: It is possible that the vision of obtaining three eggs in a dream indicates the fulfillment of the dreamer’s desires and dreams. A person’s dream of obtaining three eggs can indicate the achievement of the successes that the owner had.

title: Learn about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing the army in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing an army in a dream by Ibn Sirin When the dreamer sees an army in his dream, this dream indicates the transformation of his personality into a responsible person with goals that he wants to achieve by any means and is evidence of the young man’s enthusiasm to try anything new, and if he fights a lot. Wars show a lot of problems that will fall and he has to make some decisions. Interpretations of a dream about the army: If you see that you should go to the army, but you refused, then the dream indicates that you will not be able to bear the difficulties. If you volunteer and go to perform the service, this shows your enthusiasm, courage, and ability To overcome any difficult problem. If you can engage in wars and win them, this means that you will win and win in any experience you go through, and you will win a lot of them, and seeing you using weapons indicates that you are protecting and protecting your family. them from all harm. This dream generally indicates that you hear a lot of good news that will change your life for the better - God willing -. What does seeing the army in a dream mean to Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin confirms that if the dreamer sees himself going to the army and enjoying himself, this is evidence On the extent of his wisdom, insight, and intelligence that help him live a decent life without problems or judgments. If the dreamer sees that he is fighting with groups, this is evidence of their desire to preserve their religion, and the entry of the army for men in the dream gives them good news that they will get what they want and evidence that God will. Extending their livelihood and paving the way for them to earn halal. Seeing an army uniform confirms that the dreamer has gone through many important and fatal situations that he had to deal with with his wisdom. Still do not find an interpretation of your dream? Go to Google and search for an Egyptian website for interpreting dreams. Interpretation of a dream about the Israeli army. If you see that you are fighting the Israeli army, then this dream indicates that you will get good. After you won them. If you see that you were beaten, this indicates that life will be a little hard on you to teach you some good qualities. That's why you have to be patient and calm. If a woman sees that her house is surrounded by Israeli soldiers, this means that her house will be destroyed and she and her husband may flee. There is another interpretation of this dream that shows the extent of the woman's fear for her future, but God wants to send her a message to calm down and be patient and get closer to Him. With supplication, prayer, and charity. Interpretation of seeing an army officer in a dream: Seeing an army officer in a dream generally indicates the dreamer’s courage and his desire to obtain all his rights without any fear and proof of the dreamer’s strength of character. If a girl sees an army officer in her dream, this indicates a change in her lifestyle for the better and her ability To make decisions that contribute to sound thinking. When a married woman sees an army officer, this indicates that her children will honor their good behavior and excellence in studies, and is evidence that her home is dominated by calm and affection, and an indication that her husband will advance in his work. Reaching a high position, and an example of strength, endurance, and learning from crises. If a divorced woman sees that an army officer is going to her, this dream tells her that...
